Name: ComStar Adept
Details: After at least one year of service to ComStar and Acolyte may be elevated to the rank of Adept, who then directly answer to their local Precentor.  Adepts typically transfer posts every year or so, so they are typically well travelled within their regions.  Adepts are further distinguished by a ranking consisting of a Greek letter and Roman numeral, with the letter designating function and numeral the years of service.
